title: New: White Lodge – Prom King
body:
Boston’s **White Lodge** aka Zach and Cameron, first appeared on my radar earlier this year with their two track release, _**Mirror Shield**_, and are currently prepping their debut EP, _**How To Stay Jealous Forever**_.

The first cut to be lifted from the release is a dreamy, Wild Nothing meets Washed Out style number, centred around a killer hook and the dual vocals of the pair. Check out _Prom King_ below.
